title: Russia hits faraway targets; diplomat warns of risk of WWIII - The Associated Press
content:
1. Russia hits faraway targets; diplomat warns of risk of WWIII  The Associated Press
  2. Dramatic images emerge of Russia oil depot fire near Ukraine border  Fox News
  3. Russia targeting Western weapons shipments in Ukraine as Donbas assault begins  POLITICO
  4. Top Russian diplomat warns Ukraine against provoking WWIII  The Associated Press
  5. Moscow warns threat of a nuclear conflict ‘should not be underestimated’  The Times of Israel
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Russia unleashed a string of attacks Monday against rail and fuel installations deep inside Ukraine, far from the front lines of Moscow’s new eastern offensive, as Russia’s top diplomat warned against provoking World War III and said the threat of a nuclear conflict “should not be underestimated.”
